attributes.action: Fine the parents of youths responsable for Anti Social Behavior
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Street credit in the form of an ASBO? Rubbish! I propose we enforce fines on the parents of youths responsible for Anti-social behavior. As a parent myself, I know my child will no be out on the streets at 3am damaging your property. Enforce this fine and watch how other parents tighten the boundaries on these unruly youths!!!!
